function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"The cost of widespread testing may limit access for certain populations, leading to disparities in healthcare and potential underreporting of twitter feed for predicting stock market changes may lead to inaccurate or biased results.","category":"Pandemic impact on markets","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Correlation between stock market index, rss, and twitter feeds can lead to misinformation and speculative trading.","category":"Pandemic impact on markets","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on hospital
